pull.title: BIP-199 Fix list formatting
pull.body: The sentence "Both parties can now construct the script and P2SH address for the HTLC." was broken with part appearing below the list item.

events.message:
BIP-199 Fix list formatting

The sentence "Both parties can now construct the script and P2SH address for the HTLC." was broken with part appearing below the list item.

events.body: Ping @luke-jr : any issues with this still?
